title: Do the Chargers Need Adapters?
description:
Mina Kimes is joined by Ted Nguyen of the Athletic to talk about the vaunted AFC West. They discuss if the Broncos should "Let Russ Cook", if the Raiders new look offense can make up for their lackluster pass defense, what the Chiefs offense will look like following Tyreek Hill's departure, and if the Chargers can finally get over the hump. All that and more!
